member.name: N:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers
member.summary: Defines classes and enumerations used to create XML files that contain information about the results of diagnostic test runs in MicrosoftÂ® HPC Pack 2012.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult
member.summary: Contains information about the result of a stage in a diagnostic test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.AddBulletPoint(Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.InformationType,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds an item to the bulleted list for the object with the specified type and message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.AddTable(Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Table)
member.summary: Adds the specified table to the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.CompareTo(Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult)
member.summary: Compares this instance of the object with another specified object and indicates whether this instance precedes, follows, or appears in the same position in the order as the specified object. The order of the possible values from first to last is , , , , and .
member.returns: An object that indicates whether this instance precedes, follows, or appears in the same position in the order as the specified object.A value of less than zero indicates that this instance precedes the specified object in order. Zero indicates that this instance appears in the same position as the specified object in order. A value of greater than zero indicates that this instance follows the specified object in order.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.DeSerializeFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the XML in the specified file and creates a object with property values that match the information in the file.
member.returns: A object with property values that match the information in the specified StepResult XML file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.DeSerializeFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the XML in the specified string and creates a object with property values that match the information in the string.
member.returns: A object with property values that match the information in the specified StepResult XML.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.GetResultsFromDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the XML in the set of node_name.out files in the specified directory and creates a list of objects with property values that match the information in the files.
member.returns: A that contains a list of objects with property values that match the information in the StepResult XML files in the specified directory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.XmlSerializeToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Serializes the properties of the object into XML and saves the result in the specified file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.XmlSerializeToStandardOut
member.summary: Serializes the properties of the object into XML and sends the result to standard output.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.XmlSerializeToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Serializes the properties of the object into XML and saves the results by using the specified .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.BulletPoints
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the set of items in a bulleted list in the report for a diagnostic test run.
member.returns: A object that contains a list of objects that represent the items in the bulleted list.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Environment
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the set of environment variables that a diagnostic test should use set for the RunStep stage of the test.
member.returns: A object that contains a list of objects that represent the environment variables that the diagnostic test should set for the RunStep stage of the test.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ExceptionMessage
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the exception message that is generated by the command that created the Step Result XML.
member.returns: A object that contains the exception message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.FailedNodes
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the list of failed nodes for a diagnostic test run.
member.returns: A object that contains a list of objects that represent the nodes for which the diagnostic test failed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.IsSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the object represents a summary of the results for all of the nodes in the test or the results for just one node.
member.returns: A that indicates whether the object represents a summary of the test results for all of the nodes in the test or the test results for just one node. True indicates that the object represents a summary of the test results for all of the nodes in the test. False indicates that the object represents the test results for just one node.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Message
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the message for a stage in a diagnostic test.
member.returns: A object that contains the message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.NodeName
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the name of the node for which the object contains the results of a diagnostic test run.
member.returns: A object that contains the name of the node for which the object contains the results of a diagnostic test run. The string can also have a value of Summary, which indicates that the object contains a summary of the results for all of the nodes on which the diagnostic test ran.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Nodes
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the list of nodes on which the RunStep stage of a diagnostic test should run.
member.returns: An array of objects that represent the nodes on which the RunStep stage of the diagnostic test should run.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameters
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the list of parameters that the diagnostic test should include in the RunStep command for all of the nodes in the diagnostic test.
member.returns: A object that contains a list of objects that represent the parameters that the diagnostic test should include in the RunStep command.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Result
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the result of the diagnostic test run for the node that the property specifies, or for the entire diagnostic test run if is Summary.
member.returns: A value that specifies the result of the diagnostic test run.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Tables
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the list of tables that the report for the diagnostic test run should include for the result.
member.returns: A object that contains a list of objects that represent the tables that the report for the diagnostic test run should include for the result.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Column
member.summary: Represents a column in a table in the report for a diagnostic test run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Column.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying a name for the column.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Column.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified name as the column heading.
member.param: A that specifies the name for the column. The name also serves as the column heading.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Column.Name
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the name of a column in a table in the report for a diagnostic test run.
member.returns: A that contains the name of the column, which as serves as the column heading.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.EnvironmentVariable
member.summary: Represents an environment variable that a diagnostic test should set for the RunStep stage of the test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.EnvironmentVariable.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying the name or value of the environment variable that the diagnostic test should set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.EnvironmentVariable.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for an environment variable with the specified name and value.
member.param: String that specifies the value that the diagnostic test should set for the environment variable for the RunStep stage.
String that specifies the name of the environment variable that the diagnostic test should set for the RunStep stage.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.EnvironmentVariable.Name
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the name of the environment variable that the diagnostic test should set for the RunStep stage.
member.returns: A object that contains the name of the environment variable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.EnvironmentVariable.Value
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the value that the diagnostic test should set for the environment variable for the RunStep stage.
member.returns: A object that contains the value for the environment variable.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Information
member.summary: Represents an item in a bulleted list in the report for a diagnostic test run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Information.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying the type or content of the bulleted list item.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Information.#ctor(Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.InformationType,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified type and content.
member.param: A value that specifies the type of the bulleted list item.
An array of objects that contain the content for the placeholders in the value of the message parameter.

A string that specifies the text for the bulleted list item. The string can include placeholders such as {0}, {1}, or {2}. The diagnostic service replaces these placeholders with the objects that you specify in the args parameter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Information.Message
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the text for an item in a bulleted list in the report for a diagnostic test run.
member.returns: A object that contains the text for the bulleted list item.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Information.Type
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the information type for an item in a bulleted list in the report for a diagnostic test run, such as warning or failure.
member.returns: A value that specifies the information type for the bulleted list item.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.InformationType
member.summary: Defines the type of information that is contained in a bulleted list item in the report for a diagnostic test.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.InformationType.Failure
member.summary: The information in the bulleted list item describes a part of the diagnostic test that failed. This enumeration value represents a value of 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.InformationType.Information
member.summary: The information in the bulleted list item provides information about the result of a part of the diagnostic test. This enumeration value represents a value of 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.InformationType.Warning
member.summary: The information in the bulleted list item provides a warning message about a part of the diagnostic test. This enumeration value represents a value of 2.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Node
member.summary: Represents a node in an HPC cluster on which the RunStep stage of a diagnostic test should run or on which a diagnostic test failed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Node.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying the name of the node.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Node.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the node with the specified name.
member.param: A string that specifies the name of the node on which the RunStep stage of the diagnostic test should run or on which the diagnostic test failed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Node.Name
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the name of the node on which the RunStep stage of the diagnostic test should run or on which the diagnostic test failed.
member.returns: A object the contains the name of the node.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Node.Parameters
member.summary: Retrieves or sets a list of objects that represent the parameters and values that the diagnostic service should use when the diagnostic service runs the RunStep command on the node.
member.returns: A object that represents a list of objects that represent the parameters and values that the diagnostic service should use to run the RunStep command on the node.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter
member.summary: Represents a parameter that the diagnostic service should include when the diagnostic service runs the command for the RunStep stage of a diagnostic test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying the name, value, or format for the parameter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.
member.param: A string that specifies the value for the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
A string that specifies the name of the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, value, and format.
member.param: A string that indicates the format that the diagnostic service should use when it specifies the parameter as part of the RunStep command. For this format string, {0} represents the parameter name and {1} represents the value that is specified for the parameter. For example, the default format string is -{0}:{1}, which indicates that the diagnostic service should specify the parameter as -name:value in the RunStep command.
A string that specifies the value for the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
A string that specifies the name of the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter.Format
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the format that the diagnostic service should use when it specifies the parameter as part of the RunStep command. For this format string, {0} represents the parameter name and {1} represents the value that is specified for the parameter. For example, the default format string is -{0}:{1}, which indicates the diagnostic service should specify the parameter as -name:value in the RunStep command.
member.returns: A object that contains the format string for the parameter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter.Name
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the name of the parameter that the diagnostic service should include in the RunStep command.
member.returns: A object that contains the name of the parameter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Parameter.Value
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the value that the diagnostic service should use for the parameter in the RunStep command.
member.returns: A object that contains the value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ResultCode
member.summary: Defines the overall result of a diagnostic test run. The result appears in the State column for a test result in HPC Cluster Manager.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ResultCode.Complete
member.summary: Indicates that the test run completed. This value is appropriate for diagnostic tests that do not have criteria for failure or success. This enumeration member represents a value of 6.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ResultCode.Failure
member.summary: Indicates that the diagnostic test ran, but the results met the criteria of the diagnostic test for failure. This enumeration member represents a value of 4.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ResultCode.NoResult
member.summary: Indicates that the diagnostic test had no result. This value is the default value, and it is appropriate when you want to create a PreStepResult.xml file to provide the results of the PreStep stage of the test to the RunStep stage, which is a transition that occurs before the main part of the diagnostic test runs. This enumeration member represents a value of 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ResultCode.Success
member.summary: Indicates that the results the test run met the criteria of the diagnostic test for success. This enumeration member represents a value of 2.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.ResultCode.Warning
member.summary: Indicates that the test ran, but the results met the criteria of the diagnostic test for a warning. This enumeration member represents a value of 3.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row
member.summary: Represents a row in a table in the report for a diagnostic test run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying any of the entries for the row.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.RowItem})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified collection of objects to set the entries for the row.
member.param: A collection of objects to use as the entries in the cells of the row.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified collection of strings to set the entries for the row.
member.param: A collection of strings to use as the entries in the cells of the row.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.Items
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the set of entries in the cells of the row.
member.returns: A that represents the entries in the cells of the row.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.ItemByItemComparer
member.summary: Defines methods to support comparing rows in a table for equality.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.ItemByItemComparer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.ItemByItemComparer.Equals(Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row,Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified table rows are equal.
member.returns: A object. A True value indicates that the rows are equal. A False value indicates that the rows are not equal.
member.param: A object that corresponds to the first row that you want to compare.
A object that corresponds to the second row that you want to compare.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row.ItemByItemComparer.GetHashCode(Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Row)
member.summary: Returns a hash code for the specified table row.
member.returns: A object that contains the hash code.
member.param: A object that corresponds to the row for which you want to obtain a hash code.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.RowItem
member.summary: Represents the entry in a cell in a table in the report for a diagnostic test run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.RowItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying the content of the cell.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.RowItem.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified content for the cell.
member.param: A string that specifies the content for the cell.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.RowItem.Value
member.summary: Retrieves or sets the entry in a cell in a table in the report for a diagnostic test run.
member.returns: A that consists of the contents of the cell.

member.summary: Represents a table in the report for a diagnostic test run.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying a name, description, or columns for the table.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified description.
member.param: A string that specifies a description for the table.

member.param: A string that specifies a description for the table.
A string that specifies the name of the table.
A collection of objects that specifies the columns for the table.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, description, and column names.
member.param: A collection of objects that specifies the column names for the table.

A string that specifies the name of the table.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.Table.AddRow(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Hpc.Diagnostics.Helpers.StepResult.RowItem})
member.summary: Adds a new row to a table in the report for a diagnostic test run, by using the specified items for the entries in the row.

member.returns: A that contains the tags.
